#include "serial.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Classes

class  Sensor
 A class for all the sensors: GPS, PSI, RFID This is a wrapper class of the serial operations defined in serial.h and serial.cpp , together with some error state trackings. More...

Defines

#define SENSER_RECONNECT_DELAY   100
 If connection failed, this is the wait time until next reconnection.
#define MAX_TRY_COUNT   10
 Maximum number of times to try to reconnect to the sensor if connection keeps failing.
#define TEST_MODE   1
 Whether in test mode or not.

 The path the test input files are in.

 Sensor is not connected.
#define GPS_NO_SAT_IN_VIEW   2
 No satellites is in view.
#define GPS_NO_SAT_IN_USE   4
 No satellites is in use.

 GPS data is estimated.
#define GPS_BLANK_OUTPUT   16
 GPS output is blank.
#define GPS_INVALID_OUTPUT   32
 GPS output is not valid.
#define PSI_LOW_PRESSURE   64
 The pressure is too low.
#define RFID_CHECKSUM_FAILED   128
 The checksum for RFID is failed.
